Description.Text:
Property Location
Hotel Continental is in the heart of Palma de Mallorca, walking distance from Municipal Market of Santa Catalina and Es Baluard. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Plaza del Rey Juan Carlos I and Lonja de Palma de Mallorca.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 52 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have bathtubs and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including a health club, a sauna, and a steam room. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at Noon Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Hotel Continental is in the heart of Palma de Mallorca, walking distance from Municipal Market of Santa Catalina and Es Baluard. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Plaza del Rey Juan Carlos I and Lonja de Palma de Mallorca.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Municipal Market of Santa Catalina - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Es Baluard - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Plaza del Rey Juan Carlos I - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Lonja de Palma de Mallorca - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Plaza de Mercat - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Parc de La Mar - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Mallorca Cathedral - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Gomila Square - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Palma Town Hall - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Plaza Mayor de Palma - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Fundacion Juan March - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Juan Miro Foundation - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Pueblo Espanol - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Santa Eulalia Church - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Ferrocarril de Soller Train Station - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Continental is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
